work-item.field: Save your search for later reuse

In many cases you will want to reuse a query multiple times. In such cases it is useful to save the query.
  • Build a query with "bad" words like "easy fast quick modern..." and save it as project query with the name "bad words"

  • create a query which displays a tree view with all Reviewed requirements on top and all linked items below. The tree should be 6 levels deep. Save your query as shortcut with name "reviewed requirements impact"
